instructions: On your Android phone, open the Settings app . Tap Apps and notifications and then Notifications . Tap App notifications If the app that you want is listed as 'Off', tap the app name and then turn it on.
On your phone, open the Wear OS by Google app . Tap Notifications . Tap Block app notifications. You ll see a list of any apps that are muted. Next to the app that you want to unmute, tap Unblock .

On your Android phone, open the Settings app . Tap Apps & notifications and then Notifications . Tap App notifications . Find the app that you want to tick and tap the app name. Make sure that your notifications are turned On .
